hadiths.english_translation: Narrated that he came to Makkah and asked about the Prophet ﷺ. They said: He is at Arafat. So he came to him and approached him, but they prevented him. He said: Leave him. So he approached until the necks of both their riding animals touched. He said: O Messenger of Allah ﷺ, inform me about what keeps me away from the punishment of Allah the Exalted and enters me into Paradise. He said: Worship Allah and do not associate anything with Him, establish prayer, pay the obligatory Zakat, perform Hajj and Umrah, and I think he said: Fast Ramadan, and look at what you love for people to do to you and do that to them, and what you dislike for people to do to you, leave that from them.
